text: Stefanie Horn (born 9 January 1991 in Bottrop, Germany) is a German-Italian slalom canoeist who competed for Germany from 2006 to 2012. She has represented Italy since 2013. Horn is an athlete of the Gruppo Sportivo della Marina Militare, ==Biography== She won a silver medal in the Mixed C2 event at the 2017 ICF Canoe Slalom World Championships in Pau together with Niccolò Ferrari. She also won two silver medals in the K1 event at the European Championships. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro where she finished 8th in the K1 event. Her older sister Jacqueline represented Germany in canoe slalom. Stefanie is married to Italian slalom canoeist Riccardo De Gennaro. title: Stefanie Horn
